title: Consolidate Pattern and EditablePattern types
description: Pattern and EditablePattern are nearly identical except EditablePattern has `id: string | null`. Consider using a single base type or generic: `type EditablePattern = Omit<Pattern, 'id'> & { id: string | null }` or similar approach to reduce duplication.

title: Replace hardcoded colors with CSS variables
description:
Several components use hardcoded colors instead of CSS variables:
- #7dd3c0 should be var(--color-inhale)
- rgba(255,255,255,0.3) and similar opacity values should be CSS variables
- #fff should be var(--text-primary)

Files: BoxSlider.tsx, DurationStepper.tsx, PatternEditor.tsx, visualizations/index.tsx

title: Extract visualization inline styles where possible
description: visualizations/index.tsx has 48 inline styles. While many are dynamic (position calculations), static styles like container padding, font sizes, and transitions could be CSS classes. Low priority since dynamic styles need to stay inline.

title: Extract VisualizationPicker inline styles to CSS classes
description: VisualizationPicker.tsx has 5 inline style blocks. The viz-option name/description styles and checkmark color should be CSS classes in styles.css.

title: DeleteConfirmModal should use Modal component
description: DeleteConfirmModal builds its own modal structure (`div.modal > div.modal-content`) instead of using the reusable Modal component. Should refactor to use `<Modal>` like PatternEditor and VisualizationPicker do for consistency.

title: Extract DurationStepper inline styles to CSS classes
description: DurationStepper.tsx has 6 inline style blocks. The stepper button styles (lines 36-47, 64-77) are nearly identical and should be a single CSS class. Container, label, and value display styles should also be CSS classes.

title: Extract BoxSlider inline styles to CSS classes
description: BoxSlider.tsx has 9 inline style blocks. Track styles, tick marks, and label styles should be extracted to CSS classes. Also uses hardcoded #7dd3c0 instead of CSS variable --color-inhale.

title: Extract duplicate label styles to CSS classes in PatternEditor
description: PatternEditor.tsx has 3 duplicate label style blocks (lines 38-43, 59-64, 92-96) with identical styling for fontSize, color, display, marginBottom. These should be extracted to a CSS class like `.editor-label`.

title: Extract DeleteConfirmModal inline styles to CSS classes
description: DeleteConfirmModal.tsx has 9 inline style blocks. Button styles (lines 74-84, 92-102, 108-118) are similar and should be CSS classes like `.modal-btn`, `.modal-btn--primary`, `.modal-btn--danger`. Icon container, title, and description styles should also be CSS classes.
